net.edzard.kinetic

Class Shadow

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edzard.kinetic.Shadow

  • public class Shadow
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines properties for a shadow. Shadows can be assigned to any shape.
    Author:
    Ed
    See Also:
    Shapes

      • Shadow

        public Shadow(Colour colour,
      double blur,
      Vector2d offset,
      double alpha)
        Parametrized Ctor.
        Parameters:
        colour - Shadow colour
        blur - Gaussian blur
        offset - Offset in relation to shape
        alpha - Transparency of the shadow (0 is fully transparent, 1 is fully opaque)
